rules.description: Opt+N => Mouse Wheel Up, Opt+M => Mouse Wheel Down
Opt+; => Mouse Click Left, Opt+' => Mouse Click Right
Opt+HJKL => Mouse Move, Opt+Ctrl+HJKL => Mouse Move Faster
Toggle Caps Lock with Left Shift
Cmd+F to Ctrl+G for Alacritty only for tmux finger
Change Capslock to Control. (Escape if pressed alone)
Cmd+Shift+HJKL to Ctrl+Shift+HJKL for WezTerm only
Cmd+Ctrl+HJKL to arrow_key for specific apps

manipulators.description: Change Cmd + Ctrl + H to Left Arrow
Change Cmd + Ctrl + J to Down Arrow
Change Cmd + Ctrl + K to Up Arrow
Change Cmd + Ctrl + L to Right Arrow

rules.description: Cmd+HJKL to arrow_keys, Cmd+Ctrl+H/L to move word

manipulators.description: Change Cmd + H to Left Arrow
Change Cmd + J to Down Arrow
Change Cmd + K to Up Arrow
Change Cmd + L to Right Arrow

rules.description: Cmd+D delete char, Cmd+S delete word, Cmd+Ctrl+E forward delete
Control + Symbol keys to Shift + Symbol keys
Ctrl+U to backtick (`), Cmd+Ctrl+U to tilde (~)
Ctrl+I to hyphen(-), Cmd+Ctrl+I to underscore(_)
Ctrl+O to equal(=), Cmd+Ctrl+O to plus(+)
Ctrl+N to left_bracket ([), Cmd+Ctrl+N to left_brace ({)
Ctrl+M to right_bracket (]), Cmd+Ctrl+M to right_brace (})
